DOC.brief_summary: Two intraocular irrigating solutions (BSSPlus versus Lactated Ringer's) are compared in this prospective, randomized, masked trial to investigate for differences in preservation of corneal integrity after phacoemulsification cataract surgery.
DOC.brief_title: BSSPlus Versus Lactated Ringer's for Phacoemulsification
DOC.criteria: Patients with senile cataract Visual acuity between 20/400 and 20/40 Presence of corneal opacity Presence of corneal disease Traumatic, toxic, hereditary (congenital)and complicated cataracts(uveitis) Anterior chamber cells or flare detected before surgery Previous ocular surgery Any condition which may affect documentation or followup
